Denser_Summary: This app has numerous reported problems; users detail significant customer service issues, citing unhelpful and even abusive representatives.  Many reviews mention frustrating app glitches, causing ride cancellations and unexpected charges.  The price surge feature is frequently criticized for its unfair pricing, especially during high demand.  Ride cancellations by drivers are a common complaint, leaving users stranded and incurring fees.

Users report significant customer service issues and app glitches causing ride cancellations.  Unfair pricing, particularly during surges, is criticized.  Many describe negative driver behavior, raising safety concerns. Payment problems and unexpected charges are frequent, alongside reports of lost items in vehicles with no recourse.

Customer service, app glitches, and unfair surge pricing are major issues.  Negative driver behavior and safety concerns are highlighted, alongside payment and lost item problems.  Users also cite frequent route issues, excessive wait times, account access problems, and food delivery failures.

Uber faces criticism for customer service, app glitches, surge pricing, driver behavior, safety, payment issues, lost items, routing problems, wait times, and account problems. Food delivery and ride cancellations are also problematic. Mask mandates, language barriers, accessibility, and driver rating systems all add to user frustrations.

Uber struggles with customer service, app glitches (including iOS update issues), unfair surge pricing, driver behavior, safety concerns, payment problems, lost items, poor routing, long wait times, and account issues.  Food delivery failures, mask mandate problems, language barriers, accessibility issues, driver ratings, location inaccuracies, and refund difficulties plague the app. Users often switch to alternative apps.
